message:
Removed schedulers
Simplified recurrent API.
Updated Dox

Made future completion/cancellation threadsafe with scheduling
Added a bit more testing
Added some javadoc links to the readme

Use a circuit for tracking the state of a RecurrentFuture
Update tests to include assertions in future callbacks

Simplified test
Simpplified invocation completion
Doc fix
Added support for retryOn to retry policies
Updated pom and docs for release

Separated invocation and retry stats tracking
Added RxJava example impl
Add support for retrying when an invocation result matches a policy
Add support for checking multiple retry policy conditions
Contextual callable and runnable invocations must be manually retried and manually completed on non-failures.
Added better support for sync and async invocation tracking.

Added support for synchronous and asynchronous listeners!
Added contextual callbacks to RecurrentFuture
Added argument validation in all public APIs
Added better completion checking for synchronous retries

Updated docs for event listeners
Few changes to tests to assert stats.getAttemptCount

Added support for CheckedRunnable.
Documented Listeners.
Documented RecurrentFuture callbacks.
Added abort options to RetryPolicy. Closes #8.
Added support for synchronous contextual get/run
Created a new API entry point: Recurrent.with. Divided the API into sync and async. Unified much of the internals around these changes.
Invocation stats should be immutable when passed to async listener.
Renamed invocation APIs to execution for better consistency with java.util.concurrent.

Refactored for Failsafe.
Added support for circuit breakers.

Fallback and listener improvements

* Added additional fallback method overloads
* Allowed the various listener/fallback function types to throw checked exceptions
* Moved all Failsafe config methods to common classes
Created a simplified Additional Resources section in the readme

README.md fix snippets

Remove invalid ';' on snippets with chaining.

Support CompletionStage instead of CompletableFuture in AsyncFailsafeâ€¦ (#118)

* Support CompletionStage instead of CompletableFuture in AsyncFailsafe.future(...) and AsyncFailsafe.futureAsync(...)

* Remove unrelated changes to .gitignore
Update README to avoid withFallback ambiguity.
Updated readme with additional delay features

Add support for composable policies

- Adds new FailsafePolicy and PolicyExecutor SPIs
- Adds separate FailsafePolicy and executor implemenations for RetryPolicy, CircuitBreaker, and Fallback

# Conflicts:
#	CHANGES.md
#	README.md
#	src/main/java/net/jodah/failsafe/AbstractExecution.java
#	src/main/java/net/jodah/failsafe/CircuitBreaker.java

Move towards java.time APIs

- Replaced long + TimeUnit with Duration
- Replaced TimeUnit with ChronoUnit

Also

- Resolved race in ListenersTest
- Remove 1x readme for now
Add support for adapting an ExecutorService instance to a Scheduler
Switch to shields.io for javadoc badge

Minor concurrency improvements

- Removed some volatiles in favor of synchronized blocks

Add getLastResult and getLastFailure to ExecutionContext

Fixes #163
Related to #105
Fix computed delay links in readme

Add Timeout policy implementation

- Added Timeout policy implementation
- Added ExecutionContext.isCancelled support
- Reset interrupt flag when a synchronous execution is interrupted
- Improved handling around externally completing a Failsafe CompletableFuture
Use TimeoutExceededException to fail on Timeout
Update readme on cancellation, changelog for release
Minor doc fixes and code org
Migrate from readme to proper project website
Fix the javadoc link in the readme
Update readme and add versioning doc
Update badge to use github actions build
Update readme with new maven group id
Add rate limiter ref to readme
